title.en: Lies of the Sheriff Evans: Dead or Love

altTitles.ja-ro: Hoankan Evans no Uso - Dead or Love

altTitles.ja: 保安官エヴァンスの嘘
保安官エヴァンスの嘘 ～DEAD OR LOVE～

description.en: The story follows lawman Elmore Evans, who despite being one of the most amazing gunslingers in the West can't get rid of his bad luck in his romantic life.
description.ru: Шериф Элмор Эванс, слывущий на Диком Западе искусным стрелком, вечно терпит поражение в любви.

altTitles.ja: やぎさん郵便

description.en: University student Hirose Kiyotaka finds a love letter tucked into the pages of a borrowed book. While attempting to return the letter, he encounters the charismatic Hanashiro Seiji and quickly becomes involved with him. As their tentative relationship develops, however, he finds himself wondering how serious Hanashiro's feelings for him really are. Meanwhile, the letter falls into the hands of Hanashiro's colleague Sawa Jinichiro, who entraps its writer, Arihara Mineo. Sawa's actions are seemingly ruthless, but his true motives regarding Arihara are far from clear.

altTitles.en: แบตเทอรี่ คู่หูเบสบอล

description.en:
Meet Harada Takumi—not even in junior high and he's the best pitcher in the region, although he's frustrated and ready to give up, because he can't find a catcher who is good enough to keep up with how he pitches in this backwater town his family has just moved to. Then along comes a kid named Nagakura Gou…  
  
(Source: MU)  
  
Links:  
[AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=18153)

title.en: Isekai de Tochi o Katte Noujou o Tsukurou

altTitles.ja: 異世界で土地を買って農場を作ろう

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai de Tochi wo Katte Noujou wo Tsukurou

altTitles.en: Let’s Buy the Land and Cultivate It in a Different World

description.en:
Corporate drone Itonami Norio is summoned to another world and granted a powerful skill, [Supreme Wielder], which is invisible to those who summoned him. They’re dismayed to see he’s useless to them, so he asks only for a little plot of land to work for himself.

His skill allows him to use any tool to its greatest abilities, including fishing poles, cooking utensils, and construction tools. When he fishes up a mermaid who wants him for her bridegroom, charms a young dragon with his cooking, and excites an undead king with his rare skill, how long can his quiet country life last?!

altTitles.ja: 鷹の師匠、狩りのお時間です！

altTitles.ja-ro: Taka no Shishou, Kari no Ojikan desu!

description.en:
Aiming for unity of man and hawk! Living with a goshawk "master", hunting and tasting the prey. A four-panel essay on falconry that teaches the traditions of falconry and nature.

Its partner falcon "Donko", his hound Mira and a variety of wild birds! Meet lots of animals!

altTitles.ja: 8月31日のロングサマー

description.en:
Suzuki-kun and Takagi-san — two high-schoolers who found each other in a time loop on August 31. The two are the only ones who keep their memories when it loops. As for the cause of the time loop, one thing comes to mind — Suzuki-kun's lingering regrets for the summer, a guy's greatest ambition...

It's a time loop comedy of youth, romance, and facing love head-on!
___
**Alt Official English:** [K MANGA - United States only!](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10613/episode/353159)
description.ja:
何度も繰り返す8月31日の中で出会った高校生の二人・鈴木くんと高木さん。

記憶を繰り越せるのは二人だけ。

タイムループの原因として考えられるのは、鈴木くんが夏休みにやり残した、男子最大の目標…。

恋と真っ向から対峙する、青春タイムループコメディ！
description.ru:
31 августа повторяется снова и снова. Сохранить об этом воспоминания могут только два школьника – Сузуки-кун и Такаги-сан. Задумавшись о причине возникновения такой временной петли, Сузуки-кун пришёл к выводу, что всё дело в нём: его незавершённых делах летом и большом сожалении на этот счёт. Чтобы выбраться из временной тюрьмы подросток решает действовать…
Вас ждёт любовная комедия противостояния любви и временной петли!
description.vi: Thế giới bị rơi vào 1 vòng lặp thời gian, chỉ có 2 người giữ lại được ký ức là Suzuki và Takagi. Nếu muốn thoát khỏi vòng lặp thì Suzuki phải hoàn thành ước nguyện còn dang dở của cậu: kiếm được bạn gái và thoát kiếp trai tân.

title.en: Tensei Shitara Dainana-ouji Dattanode, Kimama ni Majutsu wo Kiwamemasu

altTitles.ja: 転生したら第七王子だったので、気ままに魔術を極めます

altTitles.en: I Was Reincarnated as the 7th Prince so I Can Take My Time Perfecting My Magical Ability

altTitles.zh-hk: 轉生為第七王子，隨心所欲的魔法學習之路

altTitles.zh: 转生七王子的魔法全解

altTitles.ru: Я перевоплотился в 7-го принца, так что я буду совершенствовать свою магию, как захочу

altTitles.vi: Chuyển sinh thành Thất Hoàng tử, tôi quyết định trau dồi ma thuật

altTitles.ja-ro: Tensei Shitara Dai Nana Ouji Dattanode, Kimamani Majutsu wo Kiwamemasu

description.en:
A magic fanatic's life came to an end after a dreadful encounter with the nobles who ended his life with a powerful spell. His last wish, being able to study and master more magic, has been answered when he was reincarnated as Lloyd de Saloom, the 7th prince of Saloom Kingdom. Being the last prince in line with no right to compete for the throne, Lloyd is basically allowed to live as he likes, allowing him to perfect his magic as he pleases…

[Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/i-was-reincarnated-as-the-7th-prince-so-i-can-take-my-time-perfecting-my-magical-ability/)
description.ja: 「魔術を極めたい！」たった一つの想いを残し死んだ男は、生前の記憶を残したままサルーム国の第七王子として転生を果たした！ 前世とは異なる桁違いの魔力量。第七王子という自由な身分。最高の環境で少年ロイドは魔術浸りの生活を望むが…。

description.en:
After breaking up with her trashy ex-boyfriend, Jung Eunkyo spends her days peacefully running a café with her friend Kim Haeda. But then, someone appears to disturb her calm life.

“Sunbae, I like you. I fell in love with you at first sight.”

Lee Jaeheon, a young, handsome man who seems to have a twisted side. Eunkyo begins to feel attracted to Jaeheon, who approaches her without hesitation... But Eunkyo’s life, which was already shaken by this new relationship, gradually begins to experience greater turmoil.

(18+ version)
description.fr:
Après avoir rompu avec son ex-petit ami peu recommandable, Jung Eunkyo passe ses journées paisiblement à gérer un café avec son amie Kim Haeda. 

Mais un jour, quelqu’un vient troubler sa vie tranquille.
« Sunbae, je t’aime. Je suis tombé amoureux de toi au premier regard. »
Lee Jaeheon, un jeune homme séduisant qui semble cacher un côté sombre. Eunkyo commence à se sentir attirée par Jaeheon, qui l’approche sans hésitation… Mais la vie d’Eunkyo, déjà bouleversée par cette nouvelle relation, commence peu à peu à connaître des troubles encore plus profonds.
description.pt-br:
Depois de terminar com seu ex-namorado desprezível, Jung Eunkyo passa seus dias pacificamente administrando um café com sua amiga Kim Haeda. Mas então, alguém aparece para perturbar sua vida calma.

“Sunbae, eu gosto de você. Eu me apaixonei por você à primeira vista.”

Lee Jaeheon, um jovem bonito que parece ter um lado distorcido. Eunkyo começa a se sentir atraído por Jaeheon, que se aproxima dela sem hesitação... Mas a vida de Eunkyo, que já estava abalada por esse novo relacionamento, gradualmente começa a experimentar uma turbulência maior.

altTitles.ja: さらい屋五葉

description.en: Masterless samurai Akitsu Masanosuke is a skilled and loyal swordsman, but his naïve, diffident nature has time and again caused him to be let go by the lords who have employed him. Hungry and desperate, he becomes a bodyguard for Yaichi, the charismatic leader of a gang called "Five Leaves." Although disturbed by the gang's sinister activities, Masa begins to suspect that Yaichi's motivations are not what they seem. And despite his misgivings, the deeper he's drawn into the world of the Five Leaves, the more he finds himself fascinated by these devious, mysterious outlaws.

altTitles.en: By Chance, a Match Made in Heaven
Match Made in Heaven by Chance

altTitles.th: โชคชะตานำพารัก

altTitles.ja: いきなり結婚生活

altTitles.vi: Lớ Ngớ Vớ Phải Tình Yêu

description.en: ‘How long have i been laying down at home…?’ Han Jia, who is turning 32 this year (she’s a freelancer who’s still doesn’t have a full-time job/jobless), suffers because of the pressure given by people around her that keep telling her to get married. Around the same time, Jin Mincheol, her childhood friend who came to Jia’s hometown for holiday, is having the same problem. Then, the two people got married just like that. Now that they have married….. ‘Huh? We match each other more than i thought?’
description.es: Jia Han, una trabajadora independiente sin trabajo de 32 años, está cansada de que sus padres insistan con que se case y se vaya de la casa. Cuando se encuentra con un amigo de la infancia, Mincheol Jin, que siente la misma presión por parte de sus padres, dice sin pensar que casarse sería una buena solución para los problemas de los dos. Pero no se imaginaba que él aceptaría su propuesta y, de repente, se encuentra de camino al altar. ¡Una historia sobre un romance inesperado que no podrás dejar de leer!
description.fr: Jia, 32 ans, sans-emploi, vit toujours avec ses parents. En ayant marre de la pression de sa famille, par un coup de tête, elle fait une demande en mariage à son ami d'enfance, Mincheol, qu'elle vient tout juste de recroiser après des années. À sa grande surprise, celui-ci accepte directement sa proposition et d'un jour à l'autre elle se trouve mariée à Mincheol. Cette union improvisée perturbe Jia, mais, petit à petit elle découvre qu'ils sont en fait... parfaits l'un pour l'autre?!
description.hu: Han Jia, jelenleg szabadságon lévő szabadúszó, közismertebb néven munkanélküli. Jia a Holdújévet a nyaggatásával ünneplő családja elől elmenekül "friss levegőt szívni", amikor összefut egy régi ismerőssel. Jin Mincheol, aki a nyomi szomszédkölyök volt egykor Jia szemében, majdnem hasonló cipőben jár, ugyanis az ő családja is azt várja, hogy párt találjon végre magának. Ekkor támad egy zseniális ötlete hősnőnknek, és kezdetét veszi a két lökött főszereplő közös élete.
description.id: Sudah berapa tahun kamu tinggal di rumah orang tua? Han Jiah (pengangguran) yang tahun ini berusia 32 tahun, hari ini juga menderita karena masih belum menikah dan bekerja. Tiba-tiba Jim Minchul, sahabat kecil Jiah muncul dan mereka memutuskan untuk menikah!?? Ternyata mereka berdua malah lebih cocok dari yang diperkirakan?!
description.ko:
집에 얹혀산 지 몇 년 차더라..? 
올해 32살을 맞이한 한지아(일하지 않는 프리랜서/무직)는 주변의 결혼하라는 눈칫밥에 오늘도 고통받는데.. 
때마침 명절을 맞이하여 고향에 내려온 소꿉친구 민철 또한 같은 고민이 있었으니.
그러면 쉬운 해결 방법이 있잖아?!? 그렇게 홧김에 결혼한 두 사람.
그런데 막상 결혼해 보니... 어라?? 생각보다 너무 잘 맞는다?!
description.th: ‘ฮันจีอา’ ฟรีแลนซ์สาววัย 32 ปีที่เบื่อหน่ายกับคำถามเรื่องแต่งงานของพ่อแม่ บังเอิญพบกับเพื่อนสมัยเด็ก ‘จินมินชอล’ หนุ่มเนิร์ดที่โดนคำถามจากพ่อแม่เรื่องนี้เช่นกัน คนโสดทั้งสองตัดสินใจจะหยุดคำถามเหล่านี้ด้วยการแต่งงาน! หรือว่านี่จะเป็นบุพเพสันนิวาส?
description.zh:
厌倦被家人催婚的两人！
就这样稀里糊涂结了婚！
今年32岁的韩智雅没工作，不知在家蹭吃蹭喝了多少年，一直被催婚……正好在过节的时候，智雅遇到了回老家过节的儿时玩伴珉哲。她发现珉哲也有相同的困扰。因此，他们俩一气之下选择结婚……
description.pt-br:
"Há quanto tempo estou deitada em casa...?"

Han Jia, que está completando 32 anos este ano (ela é uma freelancer que ainda não tem um emprego registrado), sofre com a pressão das pessoas ao redor, que ficam dizendo para ela se casar. Na mesma época, Jin Mincheol, seu amigo de infância que veio para a cidade natal de Jia para passar as férias, está tendo o mesmo problema. Então, as duas pessoas se casaram, simples assim. Agora que eles se casaram… 

"Huh? Nós combinamos mais do que pesávamos?"
description.zh-hk: 因為沒工作而一直住在老家的韓智雅總是會被家人催促結婚，就在她瀕臨崩潰的時候，遇到了有相同煩惱的兒時玩伴……

title.en: Tough Gaiden - The Man Who Succeeds the Dragon

altTitles.en: The Man Who Succeeds The Dragon

altTitles.ja: TOUGH 龍を継ぐ男

altTitles.ja-ro: Tough Gaiden - Ryuu o Tsugu Otoko
Tough Gaiden - Ryuu wo Tsugu Otoko

description.en: The series starring one of illegitimate children of Kiryu Miyazawa, Ryuusei Nakamura. Years after Kiibo founded the new dojo, both him and Kiryu mysteriously disappeared. Ryuusei, after losing his mother to cancer, is set to find out about his birth father and his destiny as the evil dragon’s heir, but he is not the only one.
description.ru:
Третья часть саги Саруватари Тэцуи во вселенной "Жесткого". Что произошло после окончания второй части? Куда подевались некоторые старые герои? Где Киичи?  
Ответ на эти и множество других вопросов вы узнаете, начав читать "Жесткий: Наследник Дракона"!

altTitles.ja: 天国大魔境

description.en: Some children live in a comfortably numb world, surrounded by walls. However, one day, a kid named Tokio receives a message asking "Do you want to go outside of the outside?"    Now, from the Heaven that is starting to crumble, the children begin their adventure!
description.fa:
دنیایی پوچ که بچه‌ها در آن با رفاه کامل همراه با دیوارهایی که درون و بیرون را جدا می‌کنند، زندگی می‌کنند اما همه‌ی این‌ها زمانی تغییر می‌کند که یکی از بچه‌ها به نام تاکیو‌ پیامی با این متن دریافت می‌کند: «می‌خوای به خارج از چیزی که اون بیرونه بری؟»

حال از بهشتی که درحال نابودی است بچه‌ها ماجراجویی خود را آغاز می‌کنند.
description.fr: Dans un immense jardin coupé du monde, un groupe d'enfants jouit d'une vie douce et d'insouciance, protégé par des scientifiques. Le monde extérieur leur est inconnu mais certains d'entre eux se questionnent : qu'y a-t-il au-delà des murs de leur paradis ?Pendant ce temps, dans un Japon dévasté par un mystérieux cataclysme, Maru et Kiruko, deux adolescents de la génération post-catastrophe, tentent de survivre dans un monde désolé peuplé de pillards et de monstres difformes. Leur objectif : atteindre "le Paradis".
description.ja: 美しい壁に囲まれた世界で暮らす子供たち。少年・トキオはある日、「外の外に行きたいですか？」というメッセージを受け取る。一方、外では、マルとおねえちゃんがサバイバル生活をしながら、天国を求めて、魔境となった世界を旅している。未来の日本を「あね散歩」。
description.pt: Em um mundo pós-apocalíptico, dois jovens: Maru um garoto amigável e que esconde vários segredos; E Kiruko, uma garota impetuosa e protetora. Juntos eles vagam pelo cenário desolado em busca de um chamado "paraíso". Enquanto isso, em um outro lugar isolado do resto do mundo, vivem várias crianças sem saber do que acontece no exterior. Como essas duas histórias vão se conectar?
description.ru:
Две истории, которые непременно связаны…

Таинственный Мару — мальчик, у которого есть одна цель: найти «Рай»! На пути к ним он обрёл телохранителя — Кируко. Она тоже не так уж проста, как может показаться на первый взгляд. В этом путешествии к «Небесам» они вместе посетят много мест ушедшей эпохи и встретят разных врагов!

Токио — девочка, которая живёт за великими стенами «Небес»! Это место можно назвать раем. Вокруг высокие деревья, зеленая трава, плантации свежих овощей и даже есть небольшой водоем! Вместе с Токио здесь можно встретить и других детей, каждый из которых обладает своим особенным даром. В один из дней Токио получает сообщение: «Ты хочешь выбраться отсюда?» Кажется, с этого момента что-то странное начинает твориться в пределах «Небес»…
description.pt-br: Em um mundo pós-apocalíptico, dois jovens: Maru um garoto amigável e que esconde vários segredos; E Kiruko, uma garota impetuosa e protetora. Juntos eles vagam pelo cenário desolado em busca de um chamado "paraíso". Enquanto isso, em um outro lugar isolado do resto do mundo, vivem várias crianças sem saber do que acontece no exterior. Como essas duas histórias vão se conectar?

altTitles.ja: 魔法少女まどか☆マギカ アンソロジーコミック

description.en: The anthology of the TV anime *Puella Magi Madoka Magica* is finally on sale! The covers are newly drawn by Aoki Ume! Here comes the supreme anthology comic where you can see Madoka and her friends again in all kinds of ways!

Short comics posted by Holiday Yasumi on Twitter/X.

The chapter numbers aren't important as most of the comics are unrelated to the rest, though some feature recurring characters.

altTitles.es-la: La Espada de la Inquisición Celestial

description.en:
“He is the master of the Nine Heavens.”

Yeon Jeokha was the child of a second wife. Viciously bullied by his father’s first wife and his siblings, he was later imprisoned in a warehouse after his father died of illness…

It has been ten years since his escape after he had learned martial arts that were out of the world.

“I regard the Yeon Family with great bitterness.”

The unstoppable adventure of the sole successor of the Heavenly Inquisition Sword, Yeon Jeokha, begins now!

altTitles.ja: 春斗くんと千春ちゃんがじれったい

description.en: Touko loves shoujo manga, especially the kind that gets her heart pounding... But shoujo isn't real life...or is it? On day Haruto and Chiharu appear in front of her, flirting like in a manga! But these two aren't dating!? And they're just childhood friends!?? No way! Check out Touko's daily observations, which are as exciting as they are frustrating☆

title.en: A Mother's Love, a Daughter's Prison

altTitles.ja: 母という呪縛 娘という牢獄

altTitles.vi: Lời nguyền của mẹ - Ngục tù của con

altTitles.ja-ro: Haha to iu Jubaku Musume to iu Rougoku

description.en: The torso of a headless, limbless body is found half-buried by a riverbank. It belonged to middle-aged mother Yaeko Miyagawa, and after an investigation and trial, her daughter Hikari eventually confesses to her murder. For many years, Hikari had been subjected to physical and emotional abuse by her mother, revolving around her failure to make it into a top medical school and become a doctor. Even after nine years of futile applications and entrance exams, Yaeko refused to free her daughter from this virtual prison. What led to the fatal stabbing that ended Yaeko’s life? This series, based on a true story, will explore Hikari Miyagawa’s experiences up to her greatest tragedy—and what happened to her afterward.
description.vi:
Đây là một câu chuyện dựa trên sự việc có thật.
Một th... th... với đầu và tứ chi bị ch.t đ.ứ.t l.ì.a được phát hiện thấy bên bờ sông. Sau khi điều tra, cảnh sát đã xác minh danh tính nạn nhân là Miyagawa Yaeko, thế nhưng rúng động hơn, hung thủ gây ra vụ án dã man này không ai khác chính là Miyagawa Hikari, con gái của bị hại.
Được biết suốt thời gian qua, Miyagawa Hikari đã liên tục bị mẹ ép học hành quá mức, và đã thi trượt vào Đại học Y đến 9 lần. Thế nhưng, mẹ cô lại không hề có ý định dừng lại. Và rồi, chuyện gì đến cũng sẽ phải đến...

altTitles.ja: 支配少女くばるちゃん

description.en:
After fierce bullying, Yuuto Kiba wanted to die. On the verge of committing suicide, his fate changes rapidly when a strange and funky beautiful girl, Kubaru, tells him, “Give me your life”.

Make your life happy with love?! A slightly strange and psycho love drama.
description.ja:
熾烈ないじめの末に、もう死にたいと思っていた少年・木場優人（きばゆうと）。自殺する寸前に、奇妙なファンキー美少女・くばるに「君の人生を頂戴」と言われたことで、運命が目まぐるしく変わっていく。

ラブで君の人生を幸せにする？！ちょっと奇妙でサイコなラブドラマ。

title.en: Uchi no Musuko wa Tabun Gay

altTitles.vi: Con Trai Tôi Có Lẽ Là Gay

altTitles.de: Ich glaub, mein Sohn ist schwul

altTitles.ja-ro: Uchi no Musuko wa Tabun Gei

altTitles.ja: うちの息子はたぶんゲイ

altTitles.en: I Think Our Son Is Gay

description.en: A sweet, open-minded mother starts suspecting one of her sons might be gay.

altTitles.ja: 猫になりたい田万川くん

description.en: For Tamagawa, volunteering at a cat café is the only relief from his stressful job. The manager tells him to, "relax and learn to be spoiled", but he doesn't know what that means until a new customer, Shindo Rai, comes to the café and tells Tamagawa he wants to keep him as a cat! Enter their strange, but fateful relationship. A pure-hearted and soothing romantic comedy.

altTitles.en: The Strings of Love Cannot Be Separated

altTitles.ja: 恋の弦は離れられない

description.en: Yuu practiced archery in his grandfather’s dojo until he met Hajime. Both join their school's archery club and aim for nationals, but in reality Yuu has no interest in tournaments despite possessing amazing talent and ability, in fact joining the club was due to Yuu's secret feelings for Hajime.

title.en: Kore kara Dandan Shiawase ni Natte Iku Kowai Onna Joushi

altTitles.ja: これからだんだん幸せになっていく怖い 女上司

altTitles.ar: رئيسة مرعبة تزداد سعادة وسعادة من الآن فصاعدًا

altTitles.ja-ro: Kore kara Dandan Shiawase ni Natte Iku Kowai Onna Joushi
Korekara Dondon Shiawase ni Natte iku Kowai Jōshi

altTitles.en: A Scary Boss, But From Now on She's Going to Be Happier and Happier

altTitles.es-la: Una jefa que da miedo, pero a partir de ahora va a ser cada vez más feliz.

description.ar: مديرتي مخيفة للغايه، لكن من الأن وصاعدًا سأبذل قصارى جهدي لجعلها الأسعد.
description.en:
This is a heart-pounding love comedy between "Manager Tsuruse'', a female boss who is scary at work but whose hobbies are cute clothes(?!), and "Tsukinawa-kun'', a new male employee who joins the company mid-career!

There is also a FANBOX version, a collection of 0.5 "Naughty" stories: 
[Kowai Onna Joushi ga Nuidara H de Kawaikatta Hanashi - FANBOX 0.5 Matome【R18】](https://mangadex.org/title/ef970af6-8357-43bb-9bd1-fe09dba78624/kowai-onna-joushi-ga-nuidara-h-de-kawaikatta-hanashi-fanbox-0-5-matome)
description.es-la: Mi jefa da mucho miedo, pero mientras más hablo con ella deja de hacerlo.

altTitles.ja: トーマの心臓

description.en:
As winter draws to a close, German boarding school student Thomas Werner dies one morning. He leaves behind a single letter addressed to his fellow student Juli that reads "Here is my love. Here is the sound of my heart."  
  
With his faith shaken to the core by the words, the scholarly Juli sinks to the depths of despair. His cynical roommate Oscar finds himself watching over Juli's fragile mental state while keeping his own feelings for Juli under wraps. Then new student Eric enters the school - and he has an uncanny resemblance to the deceased Thomas…  
  
Enter the world of a boy's boarding school in Germany where all will be revealed about the suffering and redemption that comes with love. Even today, this early work of Hagio Moto is still regarded as a brilliant masterpiece.  
  
This is volumes 11-12 of Hagio Moto Works  
  
1 Bianka (ビアンカ)  
2 Tou no Aru Ie (塔のある家)  
3 Cake Cake Cake (ケーキケーキケーキ)  
4 Sara Hill no Seiya (セーラ・ヒルの聖夜)  
5 Sangatsu Usagi ga Shuudande (３月ウサギが集団で)  
6 Poe no Ichizoku 1 (ポーの一族　　　１)  
7 Poe no Ichizoku 2 (ポーの一族　　　２)  
8 Poe no Ichizoku 3 (ポーの一族　　　３)  
9 Poe no Ichizoku 4 (ポーの一族　　　４)  
10 Kyobetsu Hata no Isansouzokunin (キャベツ畑の遺産相続人)  
11 Thomas no Shinzou First (トーマの心臓　上)  
12 Thomas no Shinzou Last (トーマの心臓　下)  
13 Juuichinin Iru! (１１人いる！)  
14 Shiiro no Yuukyuu / Kuro no Eien (東の地平・西の永久)  
15 Kono Musume Urimasu! (この娘うります！)  
16 Tottemo Shiawase Moto-chan (とってもしあわせモトちゃん)  
17 American Pie (アメリカンパイ)

altTitles.en: Just The Two of Them in The Nurse's Office

altTitles.ja: 保健室はふたりきり

description.en: A collection of interconnected yuri stories in the nurse's office.

title.en: Tale of a Scribe Who Retires to the Countryside

altTitles.ja: 落郷文士伝

description.en:
A scholar who failed the national exams is picked up by a martial arts master and given the task to record his life into a book. Through their journey, Son Bin meets many great people and soon finds himself following the same path as the master, as the Martial Arts King.   

---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/martial-arts/luoxiang/list?title_no=3657)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/luoxiangwenshizhuan/list?title_no=1567)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001425)
description.fr:
Un écrivain qui a échoué aux examens nationaux est recruté par un maître d'arts martiaux et chargé de consigner sa vie dans un livre. À travers leur voyage, Son Bin rencontre de nombreuses personnes formidables et se retrouve bientôt sur la même voie que le maître, pour devenir le roi des arts martiaux.

---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/martial-arts/luoxiang/list?title_no=3657)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/luoxiangwenshizhuan/list?title_no=1567)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001425)
description.it:
Uno studente che non ha superato gli esami nazionali viene raccolto da un maestro di arti marziali e gli viene assegnato il compito di registrare la sua vita in un libro. Durante il loro viaggio, Son Bin incontra molte persone fantastiche e presto si ritrova a seguire lo stesso percorso del maestro, come il Re delle Arti Marziali.

---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/martial-arts/luoxiang/list?title_no=3657)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/luoxiangwenshizhuan/list?title_no=1567)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001425)
description.ja:
不正だらけの科挙に落ちて挫折した孫賓の前に現れた獅子 虩は自分の戦記の記録を彼に頼む。孫賓は獅子 虩の戦記を記録することで初めて武林の世界に足を踏み入れることになる。

---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/martial-arts/luoxiang/list?title_no=3657)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/luoxiangwenshizhuan/list?title_no=1567)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001425)
description.ko:
온갖 비리가 가득한 과거 시험에 낙방해 좌절한 주인공 손빈. 
자신의 신세를 한탄하는 손빈 앞에 나타난 사자혁은 그에게 자신의 일대기를 기록할 것을 청한다. 
이후 둘은 함께 천하를 주유하게 되는데, 과연 그가 써 내려가는 무림 일대기는 어떠한 기록을 남기게 되고, 무림 세계에 발을 들이게 된 손빈의 운명은 어찌 흘러갈는지……

---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/martial-arts/luoxiang/list?title_no=3657)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/luoxiangwenshizhuan/list?title_no=1567)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001425)
description.ru:
Завалив экзамен на государственного чиновника, молодой ученый Сон Бин решает утопить свое горе в алкоголе, но по велению судьбы встречает великого воина Мурима, Са Джахека, разглядевшего в нем потенциал.
«Все, что не записано, навсегда становится утерянным и захороненным».
Са Джахек приглашает беспристрастного юношу написать мемуары о его великих подвигах и заключает с ним сделку: Сон Бин может бежать куда угодно, но, если спустя 3 дня воин найдет его, юноша последует за ним...
Какую историю запишет кисть молодого ученого? Как сложится его дальнейшая судьба в этом мире?

---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/martial-arts/luoxiang/list?title_no=3657)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/luoxiangwenshizhuan/list?title_no=1567)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001425)
description.zh:
落榜书生巧遇玄天武帝，
浪迹人间书写笔下江湖！
孙斌是个仕途多舛的贫苦文士，某天在酒馆失意买醉之时遇到了武林强者——史子赫。史子赫为了让自己的一生能够名留青史，于是让孙斌跟在他身边，将他的辉煌一生记录下来写成传记。就这样孙斌开始和史子赫周游各地，开阔眼界。终于领悟什么才是真正的强大……

---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/martial-arts/luoxiang/list?title_no=3657)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/luoxiangwenshizhuan/list?title_no=1567)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001425)
description.zh-hk:
於所有腐敗的科舉考試中落榜而感到挫折的主角——孫斌。然而，一名叫司子奕的男子出現在感嘆自己身世的孫斌面前，並要求他記載自己的生平傳記。之後兩人一起周遊天下，究竟他筆下的武林傳記會留下什麼樣的紀錄，而踏入武林世界的孫斌，命運又將會走向何處……

---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/martial-arts/luoxiang/list?title_no=3657)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/luoxiangwenshizhuan/list?title_no=1567)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001425)

altTitles.ja: レディーミツコ

description.en:
From Ivyscan  
The story of Mitsuko who was born with a 'star' on her palm. It's believed that those who are born with this mark will live to fly high, holding the stars within their grip. However she is just the third daughter of the Aoyama family who own an antique store. Her life will change forever after meeting Heinrich, an Austrian count visiting Japan.

After her parents divorced, Lu Yang moved into her mother's good friend's house and began living with the friend's daughter, Su Gui. Su Gui is smart and gentle, like the warm sun in winter, kind yet unobtrusive. She illuminates Lu Yang's life and shines into Lu Yang's heart. Lu Yang saw her as a sister, a friend, and a mother figure... Later on, Lu Yang didn't want to be her little sister anymore, she wanted to date her. However, after realizing that her feelings for Su Gui had changed, Lu Yang did not want to ruin their current relationship. She was afraid to lose her identity as "little sister". She had to change her dependence on Su Gui and distance herself. But after reuniting with Su Gui at work, the suppressed feelings bloomed like a rose, tightly binding Lu Yang and Su Gui together. Was it a long-term scheme or destiny?...

altTitles.ja: ルナティックサーカス

description.en: "Lunatic Circus" is a story about the circus called "Lunatic Circus", which is said to be the best in post WWII Japan, which has achieved an incredibly rapid economic growth. The star of the circus, Ryunosuke, and all the other trapeze artists, are the protagonists of this manga. This is the story of their dreams, their fears, their struggles and their hopes.

altTitles.ja: 異剣戦記ヴェルンディオ

altTitles.es-la: Völundio: Saga de las espadas divergentes

altTitles.vi: Volundio - Sử thi về mộng kiếm

description.en:
On a desperate battlefield... I'll start running a tavern!

Cleo, a man who has been a mercenary for 10 years, meets a mysterious girl named Kohaku. In order to survive on the battlefield, where "different swords" with great power are flying around, the two of them start running a "tavern" where soldiers gather!
description.ja:
絶望の戦場で…酒場経営はじめます！

傭兵歴10年の男・クレオは
不思議な少女・コハクと出会う。
強大な力を持つ「異剣」が飛び交う
戦場を生き延びるために、
二人が始めたのは――
兵士たちが集う「酒場」の経営！？
description.es-la:
En un campo de batalla desesperado... ¡Empieza a dirigir una taberna!

Cleo, un hombre con 10 años de experiencia como mercenario
Conoce a una misteriosa chica llamada Kohaku.
Para sobrevivir en el campo de batalla donde vuelan las poderosas "otras espadas".
Lo que los dos empiezan a hacer es... Dirigir una "taberna" donde se reúnen los soldados.

altTitles.ja: 恋より青く

description.en:
Takamine, who can't find anything she likes, and Sakikura, who loves books. The two girls meet by chance and spend their after-school hours together. Are they friends? Or is it a nameless relationship spun between the two girls?

------------
Note: Serialization of the oneshot of same title by Fukaumi Kon in COMIC Ogyaaa!! published by Homesha.

altTitles.ja: 宇崎ちゃんは遊びたい!

description.en: Annoying! Cute! But Annoying!  Shinichi Sakurai is a grumpy-faced, athletic and quiet college student who just wants to be left alone,  but he is frequently teased by his cute, stacked underclassman Hana Uzaki, whom he has known since high school.     Sugoi Dekai means something along the lines of "impressively huge."
description.pt:
A vida diária de um quieto universitário que só quer ficar sozinho, que começou a ser zombado pela sua Kouhai "Fofa! Mas irritante!".  


---

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/syokumutaiman)
description.pt-br:
A vida diária de um quieto universitário que só quer ficar sozinho, que começou a ser zombado pela sua Kouhai "Fofa! Mas irritante!".

[ 1° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 4, Cap 35. ]

title.en: Bakuage Sentai Boonboomger formation lap - Jouhouya no Your Eyes Only

altTitles.ja: 爆上戦隊ブンブンジャー formation lap 情報屋の秘密（ユア・アイズ・オンリー）

altTitles.ja-ro: Bakuage Sentai Bunbunjyā formation lap Jouhouya no Himitsu (Your Eyes Only)

altTitles.en: Bakuage Sentai Boonboomger formation lap - The Informant's Secrets (Your Eyes Only)

description.en:
The manga depicts the past of Ishiro Meita, a freelance spy who graduated from a spy training school with top grades. When he's asked to investigate an unknown object that crashed from space, his life takes a drastic turn when he meets Taiya Hando. 

(from RangerWiki)

altTitles.ja: シトラスプラス

description.en: High schoolers (and stepsisters) Yuzu and Mei have gone public with their relationship! The two are happy to be dating out in the open, but friends and family keep trying to butt in with advice. Can Yuzu and Mei figure things out on their own?
description.it: Seguito di Citrus ambientato dopo la fine del manga! Yuzu è riuscita a convincere Mei a tornare da lei e le ha chiesto di sposarla! In Citrus+ seguiremo le vicende delle due ragazze una volta riunite e delle loro amiche che non le lasciano mai sole.
description.pt-br: As estudantes do ensino médio (e meias-irmãs) Yuzu e Mei foram a público com seu relacionamento! As duas estão felizes em namorar ao ar livre, mas amigos e familiares continuam tentando se aproximar com conselhos. Yuzu e Mei podem resolver as coisas sozinhas?

title.en: Otaku ni Yasashii Gal wa Inai!?

altTitles.ja: オタクに優しいギャルはいない!?

altTitles.ja-ro: Otaku ni Yasashii Gyaru wa Inai!?
Otaku ni Yasashii Gyaru ha Inai!?

altTitles.en: Gal Can't Be Kind to Otaku!?
Gals Can't Be Kind To A Geek!?

altTitles.zh: 没有辣妹会对阿宅温柔!?

altTitles.pt-br: Gal Não Pode ser Gentil com Otaku!?

altTitles.es-la: ¿¡Las Gals no pueden ser amables con los Otakus!?

altTitles.vi: Gyaru không thể tử tế với Otaku ư?

description.en: Takuya Seo is an otaku who likes "anime for girls" and can't say he likes it out loud. One day, he hooks up with two gals from his class, Amane and Ijichi, but it seems that Amane is also an otaku...
description.ja: あまり大きな声で好きと言えない“女児向けアニメ”が好きなオタク 瀬尾卓也。ある日、クラスのギャル 天音さんと伊地知さんに絡まれたのだが、何やら天音さんもオタクの匂いが…？
description.vi: Một anh bạn trung bình Otaku thích anime dành cho bé gái, giáp mặt hai nàng Gyaru xinh đẹp nổi tiếng nhất trường. Nhưng không chỉ có thế, một trong hai nữ nhân xinh đẹp ấy có gì đó...hơi otaku thì phải...?
description.es-la: Takuya Seo es un otaku al que le gusta el "anime para chicas" y no puede decir que le guste en voz alta. Un día, se junta con dos chicas de su clase, Amane e Ijichi, pero parece que Amane también es una otaku...
description.pt-br: Takuya Seo é um otaku que gosta de "animes para garotinhas" e não pode dizer isso em voz alta. Um dia, ele conversa com duas gals da sua sala, Amane e Ijichi, mas parece que a Amane também é uma otaku... Uma comédia romântica escolar onde o otaku conhece as gals que ele gosta!

title.en: Marumaru na Kanojo ni Dekiaisarete Imasu.

altTitles.ja: 〇〇な彼女に溺愛されています。

altTitles.en: I am doted on by my 〇〇 girlfriend.

description.en:
Translated Synopsis:

"I was suddenly kissed by a man..."
The class president, Miyakaze Shin, is suddenly kissed on the lips by the most popular guy in school, Daidoin!?

This is the story of the struggles of a serious class president who is doted on by a handsome, manly girl. 

A slapstick love comedy between the popular prince of the school (♀) and the mediocre class president (♂) begins!

[Line Manga](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0003172)

altTitles.pt-br: Aulas de luta de primeira classe

description.en:
The bullied loser Kim Jaehyuk receives 'Top 1 Fighting Tutoring'!
Kim Jaehyuk is a high school student who has been living in despair under the torment of bullies. He's good at studying, but he'd rather be good at fighting.
Then, as if by fate, a 'fighting tutor' comes into his life!
description.pt-br: Kim Jaehyuk é um estudante do ensino médio que vive em desespero sob o tormento dos valentões. Ele é bom nos estudos, mas preferiria ser bom na luta. Então, o destino põe um "tutor de luta" em sua vida!

altTitles.ja: 三億円事件奇譚 モンタージ

description.en:
One day, 10-year-old Yamato and his friend Miku discover a man in a back alley who's suffering from vicious stab wounds. The man recognizes Yamato, and uses his last breath to share a secret with the children: Yamato's father was the perpetrator of a bank robbery that is known throughout the country as the most puzzling unsolved crime of the 20th century. He warns them to "never trust anyone."  
Miku makes Yamato swear to keep the man's final words a secret. A few days later, Yamato's father is found dead, and the boy is taken in by Miku's family. The death is ruled as an accident, but Yamato has his doubts. Six years later, Yamato still can't stop wondering about the incidents, and resolves to take action.

"A Party Cure" takes place in 1996, when strange events began to unfold in Tells Newhour, the number of Deviants - people who had obtained abilities through murder - is on the rise. It did not go unnoticed by the special forces of the town "Cat Mafia".
description.ru: История "Это Пати Кюр" разворачивается во время 1996-го года в городе "Теллс Нуар", где начинаются странные события. Внезапно возросло число Отклонённых - людей, получивших способности с помощью убийств. И это не могло остаться без внимания полиции города "Кошачьей Мафии".

description.en: Assistant manager Cho Daechan who worked as a office worker for ten years died in vain from being overworked at a young age, because he could not endure the abuse of power of his evil boss. He thought it was all over... He opened his eyes again as a 18 years old high school student. A miraculous opportunity that will never happen again. “In this life, I will grit my teeth and live my life! I will clear up my life of being trampled on and succeed  as if I am showing off. You don't think I can do it? No, I can do it!”

title.en: Moto Dorei Desu ga, Oni no Dorei wo Katte Mitara Seiryoku ga Tsuyosugiru node Sutetai...

altTitles.ja: 元奴隷ですが、鬼の奴隷を買ってみたら精力が強すぎるので捨てたい……

altTitles.ja-ro: Moto Dorei Desu ga, Oni no Dorei o Katte Mitara Seiryoku ga Tsuyosugiru node Sutetai...

altTitles.en: I'm a Former Slave, but I Tried to Buy an Oni Slave Whom I Later Found to Have Too Much Energy, so I Want to Throw Him Away...
I Bought a Demon Slave but He's So Strong That I Want to Throw Him Away...

altTitles.zh: 本来身为奴隶，买了鬼做奴隶结果却因为精力太旺盛了好想扔掉

description.en: It has been seven years since Sora Ono was sent to another world, where she was enslaved. Because of a clerical error, her “slave” status was revoked, and Sora walked away a free woman. Then one day, she purchases a slave...

Mu Shiba and Long Shuo — one hot-blooded and passionate, the other cold and distant. Despite their vastly different personalities, the two young men's paths cross and they set out on a journey to find the mysterious "Xiao"...
description.es: Mu Shiba y Long Shuo: uno ardiente y apasionado, el otro frío y distante. A pesar de sus personalidades tan diferentes, los caminos de los dos jóvenes se cruzan y emprenden un viaje para encontrar al misterioso «Xiao»...

altTitles.ja: DARKER THAN BLACK-漆黒の花-
ダークーザンブラック-漆黒の花-

altTitles.en: Darker than Black: Jet Black Flower

description.en:
In Tokyo, an impenetrable field known as "Hell's Gate" appeared ten years ago. At the same time, psychics who wield paranormal powers at the cost of their conscience also emerged. Hei is one of the most powerful of these psychic agents. Along with his blind associate, Yin, he works for one of the many rival agencies vying to unlock the mysteries of Hell's Gate.  
  
The manga follows Hei and Yin as they investigate how a Black Dandelion is giving Contractor-like powers to people who come in contact with it.   
  
Tells the storyline between the first and second seasons of the anime.

title.en: Daily Life of Sa-chan, a Drugstore Clerk

altTitles.ja: ドラッグストア店員さっちゃんの日常

altTitles.vi: Chuyện nàng Sa ở tiệm thuốc

altTitles.ja-ro: Drug Store Tenin Sacchan no Nichijou

altTitles.fr: Le quotidien de Sa-Chan, une vendeuse comme une autre
Le quotidien de Sa-chan, une employée de pharmacie

altTitles.vi: Chuyện Đời Thường Của Nhân Viên Hiệu Thuốc, Sa-Chan
Cuộc Sống Thường Ngày Của Nhân Viên Hiệu Thuốc Sa-Chan

description.en: A series between the expressionless drugstore clerk, Sa-chan, and her boisterous childhood friend who's head over heels over Sa-chan but hesitant in confessing his love for her. Join them in their romcom-packed everyday life working at a drugstore.
description.fr: > Une série réunissant une employée de pharmacie sans expression, Sa-chan, et son ami d'enfance turbulent qui est fou amoureux d'elle mais qui hésite à lui avouer son amour. Accompagnez-les dans leur quotidien plein de comédie amoureuse en travaillant dans une pharmacie.
description.id: Seri antara petugas toko obat tanpa ekspresi, Sa-chan, dan teman masa kecilnya yang riuh yang jungkir balik terhadap Sa-chan tetapi ragu-ragu dalam mengakui cintanya padanya. Bergabunglah dengan mereka dalam kehidupan sehari-hari mereka yang penuh romansa bekerja di toko obat.
description.ja: ドラッグストアで働くさっちゃんとその幼なじみが両思いなんだけど、お互い気づかなくて毎日やきもきする話です。
description.pt-br: Uma série entre a inexpressiva balconista da drogaria, Sa-chan, e seu turbulento amigo de infância que está de ponta-cabeça por Sa-chan, mas hesita em confessar seu amor por ela. Junte-se a eles em sua vida cotidiana repleta de comédia romântica trabalhando em uma farmácia.

title.en: Kimi ga Shinu Made Koi wo Shitai

altTitles.ja: きみが死ぬまで恋をしたい

altTitles.en: I Want to Love You Till Your Dying Day
My Wish Is To Fall In Love Until You Die

altTitles.ja: きみ死ぬ

altTitles.pl: Pragnę Cię kochać aż do Twej śmierci

altTitles.uk: Хочу кохати, допоки ти не вмерла

altTitles.id: Keinginanku Adalah Jatuh Cinta Sampai Kamu Mati

altTitles.th: เพียงได้รักตราบสิ้นลมหายใจ

altTitles.en: I want to love you until you die

description.en:
At the mysterious orphanage where Sheena lives, death is nothing new to its residents—girls who no longer have families of their own, who are raised as weapons of war, taught to kill and take the lives of others without batting an eye. Everyone, that is, except Sheena, who wishes for nothing more than the growing conflict around her to end.

On the night of her roommate’s death, Sheena meets a strange girl covered in blood, who smiles despite the turmoil surrounding them. The next day, the girl appears as a new student in Sheena's class and introduces herself as Mimi. Initially thought to be a school myth, there are now whispers in the orphanage’s halls that Mimi is their secret weapon—an immortal who cannot die. 

When Mimi is later assigned as Sheena’s new roommate, Sheena’s world grows even more complicated when she begins living with someone who loves and welcomes death, when all Sheena wants to do is stop it… 

A story of two girls' innocent wishes, found in a world next to death.
description.uk:
Десь на далекому закуточку світу між високих гір є одна дитяча школа-інтернат. Тут дітей ще з малого віку виховують, як магічно-військову зброю та гонять на війну заради країни. Будь-кого можуть відправили на поле бою в будь-який момент, а шанси вижити навіть у старанного учня – мізерні. Жорстока буденність, у якій немає місця для співчуття до загиблих товаришів.

Шіна – звичайна чотирнадцятирічна учениця цієї школи, серцю якої важко миритися з такою буденністю. Однієї ночі, вона зустріла в холі скривавлену дівчинку, яка щойно повернулася з бою – Мімі. Здавалося б, вони несумісні: Шіна не зносить тягаря оточуючої реальності та прагне мирного життя, а Мімі йде на війну з радісною посмішкою та повертається в крові подоланих ворогів. Проте разом проведений час та щире бажання зрозуміти один одного змогли навіки переплести їх долі, які тепер розлучить лиш смерть.

Це історія двох дівчат між смертю та коханням, які знайшли в цьому світі свою маленьку невинну мрію.

altTitles.ja: ミスミさんは見透かせない

description.en: A romantic comedy about Yuri Tsuguto, who has clairvoyance but isn’t good at it, and Misumi Mitsuhashi, a girl who likes strange things. One day, when Yuri looks at Misumi’s back, he notices that her jacket is transparent and behind it is the message “If anyone can read this, come to the astronomy clubroom after school.” When he goes to the clubroom and explains his clairvoyance ability, Misumi becomes excited and asks “Why don’t you let me study you?”

In a world where magic and might clash, Isoc dreams of becoming a wizard despite his muscular build. Raised by Father Kay, a priest who insists he become a fighter, Isoc faces constant pressure to follow a path he doesn't desire.

Desperate to pursue his magical aspirations, Isoc ventures into the treacherous Dark Forest. There, he's attacked and nearly killed by a curse-eaten monster. At the brink of death, he's saved by a mysterious figure known only as the Witch.

However, salvation comes at a price. The Witch, seeing potential in Isoc, forcefully binds him into a magical contract. "I'll give you a curse, so make a contract with me!" she declares, insisting that Isoc now owes her his life.

altTitles.ja: ニセモノの錬金術師

description.en:
In another world,
there was a person
who made their living
doing alchemy.

Alchemy × Sorcery × Slave × Elf × Reincarnation × God × Cheat × Battle……
A work packed with everything fantasy brought to life with overwhelming brushwork!
description.ja:
異世界で、
錬金術を生業とする
ひとりの人間が
おりました――。 

錬金術×呪術×奴隷×エルフ×転生×神様×チート×バトル……
ファンタジーのすべてが詰まった作品が、圧倒的筆致により連載開始！
description.pt-br:
Em outro mundo, havia uma pessoa que ganhava a vida fazendo alquimia.

Alquimia × Feitiçaria × Escrava × Elfa × Reencarnação × Deus × Trapaça × Batalha……

Uma obra repleta de tudo o que é fantasia e trazida à vida com uma pincelada impressionante!

description.en:
This Life, I Will Succeed

A mountain of corpses, a sea of blood.
At the summit, only two people remained.

"Why did you save me?"
"At last... you're looking at me."
"I'll ask again. Why did you save me?"

The man was curious.
It was natural.
The woman was his sworn enemy.
And their rivalry should have ended there.
The final act was to be his death.
Those he believed were his subordinates stabbed him in the back, and even more enemies rushed to target him.

"Answer me. Why did you keep me alive!"

"Don't cry..."

"Am I... crying?"

Hot tears were flowing from eyes he thought had dried up long ago.

"Just think of it as a bad dream. A very painful and terrible dream."
"But if our time together held any value at all."
"Even at the end of this nightmare, please find me again."

Thump thump thump thump.
The mountain of corpses began to rumble.
Simultaneously, beyond the blood-red earth, numerous flags rose amidst a hazy dust.

"Uaaaaaah!"
The man roared upon seeing the massive blood-colored flag.

"Mangcheon Assembly! I won't let you get away with this."

Will Cho Un-hwi, who has been given a new life, be able to find his bride-to-be?

"Today's kids have no manners."

"It's you who raised them that way."

Jung Buldo, the legendary fist, tries to start a new life after being released from prison.

However, those close to Buldo are being harassed by the new generation of MZ gangsters.

Tae Eunseok, who has been watching this, tries to use Buldo for his own revenge...
